content.question: Senator Hoffman is campaigning for reelection in her state. Her campaign message emphasizes how the policies she has supported have benefited her constituents. She has spotlighted job creation and an overall improvement in the standard of living in the state in the past six years. Senator Hoffman is hoping to appeal to which of the following voting behavior models?

topic.text: 5.1: Voting Rights and Models of Voting Behavior

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors illustrated in different scenarios in context.
